A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was the biggest cinematic failure I have ever seen. Shame on Disney for allowing such an insanely pretentious film. After seeing this movie I cannot decide whether I want to see Episode IX in theaters; I know I will never see a Rian Johnson movie in theaters ever again (DON'T LET RIAN JOHNSON MAKE HIS TRILOGY... IT WILL FAIL).
